attributes.action: The EU deal is more like a capitulation signed by a nation after losing a war.
attributes.additional_details: Make MPs represent their constituents and vote for a no deal brexit. We would have a better chance of getting a good deal after we leave the EU rather than pleading with them from within.
attributes.background: Having a no deal brexit option is now the only way that we will get the leverage to get a reasonable deal from the EU. The EU has made it clear that it's their deal or no deal.
